"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor: This song represents the determination and strength needed to overcome challenges in life. It's a great motivator and reminds us to keep pushing forward no matter what obstacles we face.

"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor: This classic anthem is all about resilience and perseverance. It's a reminder that no matter what happens, we can always bounce back and come out stronger on the other side.
"Stronger" by Kelly Clarkson: This empowering song reminds us to embrace our strength and overcome our fears. It's a great reminder to believe in ourselves and never give up.

"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey: This iconic rock anthem reminds us to never give up on our dreams. It's a great reminder to keep pushing forward and never lose hope, no matter how impossible things may seem.
"Roar" by Katy Perry: This uplifting song reminds us to unleash our inner power and strength. It's a great reminder to be confident, stand up for ourselves, and never back down from a challenge.
